title: Fresh tuna, sun-dried tomato and artichoke linguine
ingredients: ['1 (500g) pack linguine pasta', '4 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 onion, diced', '3 sprigs fresh thyme, leaves removed', '675g (1 1/2 lb) fresh tuna steaks, diced', '100ml (4 fl oz) dry white wine', '450ml (16 fl oz) chicken stock', '4 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '50g (2 oz) chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', '75g (3 oz) sliced marinated artichoke hearts', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
